title: Omar Velez - Orlando Health - One of Central Florida's Most Comprehensive Healthcare Networks
cleaned_text: Omar Velez, MD Medical School: Ponce Health Sciences University Academic Interests: Medical Education, Critical Care Why ORMC: Because just like life, residency is about fit and balance. ORMC has the perfect balance of being a proven solid program with an excellent reputation within a supportive environment. I was looking for a place with a diverse patient population and a large Hispanic community. All of that, added to the support of a fantastic faculty, great facility, and world-class education, made my decision easy. I am honored and grateful to be part of La Familia! Hobbies & Interests: Riding my bike to new places, anything sports or outdoor related. Favorite on shift snack / beverage: Any good
